message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product. I believe it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start with a competitive price. I'm offering it to you for $1,200,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. It's a great product, but I'm really looking to stay under $800,000. I'm willing to offer $750,000. Let's see if we can make this work.

I understand you're looking to stay under $800,000, Bob, but I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to be closer to my target. I'm offering it to you for $950,000.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. $950,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $850,000, which is closer to my budget. I hope you can see this is a fair offer.

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to be closer to my minimum. I'm offering it to you for $900,000.

Alice, I'm trying to be reasonable here, but $900,000 is still out of my budget. I'm going to stick with my previous offer of $850,000. If you're not willing to accept it, I might have to go with John's offer.

I understand you're trying to make a decision, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $900,000. However, I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a free premium service package worth $50,000. This way, you'll get the product at a price that's still a great value for you. I'm offering it to you for $900,000, with the premium service package included.
